source_sentence: 合部金光明經卷第五
translation: Sutra of Golden Light in the Union Part, Volume 5

source_sentence: 隋大興善寺沙門釋寶貴合
translation: Śākyamuni's precious companion at Daxingshansi in the Sui Dynasty

source_sentence: 北涼天竺三藏曇無讖譯
translation: Translated by the Tripiṭaka of Northern Liang and India, Dharmakṣema

source_sentence: 四天王品第十
translation: tenth rank of the four heavenly kings

source_sentence: 爾時，毘沙門天王、提頭賴吒天王、毘留勒叉天王、毘留博叉天王俱從坐起，偏袒右肩，右膝著地，胡跪合掌白佛言：「世尊！
translation: At that point, Vaiśravaṇa, Dhṛtarāṣṭra, Virūḍhaka, and Virūpākṣa all rose from their seats, bared their right shoulders, knelt on their right knees, put their palms together, and said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 是金光明微妙經典——眾經之王——諸佛世尊之所護念，莊嚴菩薩深妙功德，常為諸天之所恭敬，能令天王心生歡喜，亦為護世之所讚嘆。
translation: This marvelous sūtra of golden light-the king of scriptures-that the buddhas honor, adorns the profound and wonderful virtues of the bodhisattva, is always venerated by the gods, rejoices the hearts of god kings, and is praised by those who protect the world.

source_sentence: 此經能照諸天宮殿、是經能與眾生快樂、是經能令地獄餓鬼畜生諸河燋乾枯竭、是經能除一切怖畏、是經能却他方怨賊、是經能除穀貴飢饉、是經能愈一切疫病、是經能滅惡星變異、是經能去一切憂惱。
translation: This sūtra can illuminate the palaces of the gods, it can make sentient beings happy, it can cause the rivers of hell, hungry ghosts, and animals to dry up and wither, it can remove all fears, it can counteract enemies and thieves from other directions, it can remove famine in the fields, it can heal all epidemics, it can extinguish the mutations of bad stars, and it can remove all sorrow and distress.

source_sentence: 舉要言之：是經能滅一切眾生無量無邊百千苦惱。
translation: To sum up, this sūtra can extinguish measureless, limitless, and one hundred thousand sufferings and distress of all sentient beings.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 是金光明微妙經典，若在大眾廣宣說時，我等四王及餘眷屬，聞此甘露無上法味增益身力、心進勇銳、具諸威德。
translation: When this subtle scripture of golden light is widely proclaimed in the assembly, the four kings and the rest of our retinue hear about this unsurpassed taste of ambrosia and dharma, which increases their physical strength, mental agitation, and assumes great authority.

source_sentence: 「世尊！
translation: "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我等四王能說正法、修行正法，為世法王以法治世。
translation: We four kings can teach the right Dharma and practice the right Dharma, and we are the Dharma kings of the world who govern the world.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我等四王及天、龍、鬼神、乾闥婆、阿修羅、迦樓羅、緊那羅、摩睺羅伽以法治世，遮諸惡鬼、噉精氣者。
translation: We four kings, gods, dragons, spirits, gandharvas, asuras, garuḍas, kiṃnaras, and mahoragas rule the world to keep evil spirits and those who devour energy at bay.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我等四王、二十八部諸鬼神等，及無量百千鬼神，以淨天眼過於人眼，常觀擁護此閻浮提。
translation: We four kings, 28 demon spirits, and measureless hundreds of thousands of other demon spirits always observe and protect Jambudvīpa with the pure divine eye, which is superior to the human eye.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 是故我等名護世王。
translation: That's why we're called the guardian kings of the world.

source_sentence: 若此國土有諸衰耗、怨賊侵境、飢饉疾疫、種種艱難，若有比丘受持是經，我等四王當共勸請，令是比丘以我力故，疾往彼所國邑郡縣廣宣流布是金光明微妙經典，令如是等種種百千衰耗之事悉皆滅盡。
translation: If this land is beset by debilitation, enemies and thieves, hunger, disease, and various difficulties, and if a monk accepts this sūtra, we four kings will jointly encourage him to make sure that monk, because of my strength, quickly goes to that town or county and widely disseminates this subtle sūtra of golden light, so that all of these hundreds of thousands of debilitating conditions will cease.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 如諸國王所有土境，是持經者若至其國，是王應當往是人所聽受如是微妙經典。
translation: "Suppose a king has a land or territory that's the holder of a sūtra, and if he goes to that country, the king should go to that person to hear and accept such a subtle sūtra.

source_sentence: 聞已歡喜，復當護念恭敬是人。
translation: After rejoicing when he hears it, he should also protect, honor, and respect that person.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我等四王復當勤心擁護是王及國人民，為除衰患，令得安隱。
translation: We four kings will again diligently support this king and his people to remove the troubles and make them comfortable.

source_sentence: 「世尊！
translation: "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若有比丘、比丘尼、優婆塞、優婆夷受持是經，若諸人王有能供給施其所安，我等四王亦當令是王及國人一切安隱，具足無患。
translation: If monks, nuns, laymen, and laywomen accept this sūtra, then if there are people whose kings are able to make offerings to them and give them peace, we four kings will also make that king and his people completely comfortable and completely trouble-free.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若有四眾受持讀誦是妙經典，若諸人王有能供養、恭敬、尊重、讚嘆，我等四王亦復當令如是人王於諸王中常得第一供養、恭敬、尊重、讚嘆，亦令餘王欽尚羨慕、稱嘆其善。」
translation: If these four congregations retain and recite this wonderful sūtra, and if there are human kings who can offer support, honor, respect, and praise it, we four kings will also cause such a human king to always receive the highest level of support, respect, honor, and praise among kings, and cause the other kings to admire and praise his goodness."

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊讚嘆護世四天王等：「善哉，善哉！
translation: At that point, the Bhagavān praised the four heavenly kings who protected the world, "Good, good!

source_sentence: 汝等四王過去以曾供養、恭敬、尊重、讚嘆無量百千萬億諸佛，於諸佛所種諸善根，說於正法、修行正法，以法治世，為人天王。
translation: "In the past, you four kings made offerings to, honored, respected, and praised measureless hundreds of thousands of millions of buddhas, planted good roots in their places, taught the right Dharma, cultivated the right Dharma, and ruled the world as kings of humans and gods.

source_sentence: 汝等今日長夜利益於諸眾生，行大悲心施與眾生一切樂具，能遮諸惡，勤與諸善。
translation: Today, you spend a long night benefiting sentient beings, acting with great compassion to give them all the pleasant things they need, shielding them from evil and diligently promoting goodness.

source_sentence: 以是義故，若有人王能供養恭敬此金光明微妙經典，汝等正應如是護念，滅其苦惱、與其安樂。
translation: For this reason, if there are kings who offer support and respect this subtle scripture of golden light, you should precisely protect and remember it in this way, ending their suffering and distress and bringing them well-being.

source_sentence: 汝等四王及諸眷屬、無量無邊百千鬼神若能護念如是經典者，即是護持去來現在諸佛正法。
translation: If you four kings, your retinues, and measureless, limitless hundreds of thousands of ghosts and spirits can guard and remember such a scripture, you're guarding the right Dharma of the past and future Buddhas in the present.

source_sentence: 汝等四王及餘天眾百千鬼神，與阿修羅共戰鬪時，汝等諸天常得勝利。
translation: When you four kings and the rest of the gods and hundreds of thousands of demons fight with asuras, you gods always get victory.

source_sentence: 汝等若能護念是經，悉能消伏一切諸苦，所謂怨賊、飢饉、疾疫。
translation: If you guard and remember this sūtra, you'll all be able to quell all suffering, such as enemies, hunger, and epidemics.

source_sentence: 若四部眾有能受持讀誦此經，汝等亦應勤心守護，為除衰惱、施與安樂。」
translation: If there are four groups of people who can accept, read, and recite this sūtra, you should also diligently guard it to remove discomfort and give it peace and happiness."

source_sentence: 爾時，四王復白佛言：「世尊！
translation: It was then that the four kings again said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 是金光明微妙經典，於未來世在所流布——若國土、城邑、郡縣、村落——隨所至處，若諸國王以天律治世、復能恭敬至心聽受是妙經典、并復尊重供養供給持是經典四部之眾，以是因緣，我等時時得聞如是微妙經典，聞已即得增益身力、心進勇銳、具諸威德。
translation: "When this subtle sūtra of golden light is distributed in the future-if there are lands, cities, towns, villages, and villages-whereever it goes, and if the kings of countries who rule the world with the laws of gods and goddesses respectfully and wholeheartedly listen to and accept this wonderful sūtra and respectfully make offerings to the four groups of people who uphold it, we'll be able to hear such a wonderful sūtra from time to time, and after hearing it, we'll attain physical strength, mental agility, and the full possession of authoritative qualities.

source_sentence: 是故，我等及無量鬼神常當隱形，隨是妙典所流布處而作擁護，令無留難；亦當護念聽是經典諸國王等及其人民，除其患難，悉令安隱，他方怨賊亦使退散。
translation: Therefore, we and measureless demons and spirits will always take cover and follow the dissemination of this wonderful sūtra, shielding it so that there are no difficulties, and we'll also guard and remember the kings of countries and their people who hear this sūtra, removing their troubles and difficulties and making them all comfortable, and causing resisters and thieves from other directions to retreat.

source_sentence: 若有人王聽是經時，隣國怨敵興如是念：『當具四兵壞彼國土。』
translation: When a king listens to this sūtra, the enemies of that neighboring country think, 'They will bring four armies to destroy their land.'

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 以是經典威神力故，爾時隣敵更有異怨為作留難，於其境界起諸衰惱、災異、疫病，爾時怨敵起如是等諸惡事已，備具四兵發向是國規往討罰，我等爾時當與眷屬、無量無邊百千鬼神隱蔽其形為作護助，令彼怨敵自然退散，起諸怖懼、種種留難。
translation: At the time, because of the authoritative power of this sūtra, another enemy in the neighboring country made an objection, causing misfortune, disasters, and epidemics to arise in their situation, and after such bad things had occurred to them, they prepared four armies and sent them to that country to seek punishment.

source_sentence: 彼國兵眾尚不能到，況復當能有所破壞？」
translation: How could that country's armies fail to reach them, so how could they do anything to harm them?"

source_sentence: 爾時，佛讚四天王等：「善哉，善哉！
translation: At that point, the Buddha praised the four heavenly kings and so forth, "Good, good!

source_sentence: 汝等四王乃能擁護我百千億那由他劫所可修習阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，及諸人王、受持是經、恭敬供養者為消衰患，令其安樂；復能擁護宮殿、舍宅、城邑、村落、國土、邊疆，乃至怨賊悉令退散，滅其衰惱，令得安隱；亦令一切閻浮提內所有諸王無諸凶衰、鬪訟之事。
translation: 汝等四王乃能擁護我百千億那由他劫所可修習阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，及諸人王、受持是經、恭敬供養者為消衰患，令其安樂；復能擁護宮殿、舍宅、城邑、村落、國土、邊疆，乃至怨賊悉令退散，滅其衰惱，令得安隱；亦令一切閻浮提內所有諸王無諸凶衰、鬪訟之事。

source_sentence: 「四王當知，此閻浮提八萬四千城邑聚落，八萬四千諸人王等，各於其國娛樂快樂，各各於國而得自在，於自所有錢財珍寶各各自足不相侵奪，如其宿世所修習業隨業受報，不生惡心貪求他國，各各自生利益之心、生於慈心、安樂之心、不諍訟心、不破壞心、無繫縛心、無楚撻心，各於其上自生歡樂，上下和穆猶如水乳，心相愛念增諸善根。
translation: "Four kings should know that 84,000 cities and villages in Jambudvīpa and 84,000 human kings each enjoy the pleasures of their country, each attains freedom in their country, each has enough money, possessions, and treasures of their own, each doesn't plunder one another, each receives the results of their actions as they've cultivated actions in prior lifetimes, each doesn't give rise to bad thoughts and desires for other countries, each produces a mind for benefit, a mind for kindness, a mind for happiness, a mind that's not contentious, a mind that's not destructive, a mind that's not fettered, and a mind that's not harsh, each produces happiness in their own place, the upper and lower parts are harmonious and moist like water and milk, and mindfulness of each other increases the good roots.

source_sentence: 以是因緣故，此閻浮提安隱豐樂，人民熾盛，大地沃壤，陰陽調和，時不越序，日、月、星宿不失常度，風雨隨時，無諸災橫，人民豐溢，自足於財，心無貪悋亦無嫉妬，等行十善，其人壽終多生天上天宮，充滿增益天眾。
translation: As a result, this Jambudvīpa is peaceful and abundant, its people flourish, the earth is fertile, yin and yang are in harmony, the seasons don't run out of order, the sun, moon, and stars don't lose their regularity, the wind and rain come at regular intervals, there's no misfortune, the people are abundant, they're self-sufficient in possessions, their minds aren't greedy or jealous, and they equally practice the ten good qualities, and at the end of their lives they're often born in the heavenly palaces, which are filled with a multitude of gods.

source_sentence: 「若未來世有諸人王聽是經典，及供養、恭敬、受持是經四部之眾，是王則為安樂利益汝等四王及餘眷屬、無量百千諸鬼神等。
translation: "If there are human kings in future generations who listen to this sūtra and the multitude of people who support, venerate, and accept the four parts of this sūtra, that king will benefit you four kings, the rest of your retinue, and measureless hundreds of thousands of spirits and other spirits for their well-being.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 汝等四王若得時時聞是經典，則為已得正法之水服甘露味，增益身力、心進勇銳、具諸威德。
translation: "If you four kings could hear this sūtra from time to time, you would have attained the taste of ambrosia from the waters of the right teaching, which would increase your physical strength, mental energy, and virtue.

source_sentence: 是諸人王若能至心聽受是典，則為已能供養於我；若供養我，則是供養過去、未來、現在諸佛；若能供養過去、未來、現在諸佛，則得無量不可思議功德之聚。
translation: If you human kings can wholeheartedly listen to this sūtra, it means that you've been able to make offerings to me, that if you make offerings to me, you're making offerings to past, future, and present buddhas, and that if you can make offerings to past, future, and present buddhas, you'll attain an unfathomable stock of unfathomable merit.

source_sentence: 以是因緣，是諸人王應得擁護，及后妃、婇女、中宮眷屬、諸王子等亦應得護，衰惱消滅、快樂熾盛；宮殿堂宇安隱清淨，無諸災變，護宅之神增長威德，亦受無量歡悅快樂；是諸國土所有人民悉受種種五欲之樂，一切惡事悉皆消滅。」
translation: Because of this, these human kings should be protected, and so should their wives, concubines, inner palace retinues, and princes, whose troubles cease and whose happiness flourishes; their palaces and halls are peaceful and pure, free of calamity; the house guardian spirits grow in authority and receive measureless joy and happiness; all the people of those lands experience the various five pleasures, and all bad deeds cease."

source_sentence: 爾時，四天王白佛言：「世尊！
translation: It was then that the four heavenly kings said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 未來之世若有人王欲得護身，及后妃、婇女、諸王子等、宮殿屋宅得第一護身所、王領最為殊勝、具不可思議王者功德、欲得攝取無量福聚、國土無有他方怨賊、無諸憂惱及諸苦事。
translation: "In a future age, if there's a king who wants to protect his body, his consorts, concubines, princes, and so forth, obtain the first place in his palace or house to protect his body, have the king's leadership most distinguished, possess unfathomable royal virtues, want to gather an innumerable amount of merit, have his land free of enemies and thieves from other places, and have no sorrow or suffering.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 如是人王不應放逸散亂其心，應生恭敬謙下之心，應當莊嚴第一微妙最勝宮宅，種種香汁持用灑地，散種種華敷大法座師子之座，兼以無量珍琦異物而為絞飾，張施種種無數微妙幢幡、寶蓋。
translation: Thus, the king of men should not be careless and dissipated, but should produce a respectful and humble mind that adorns the most subtle and excellent palace, sprinkles the ground with various perfumes, spreads flowers of various kinds to decorate the lion's seat of the great Dharma throne, decorates it with measureless rare and exotic things, and spreads an incalculable number of subtle banners, flags, and jeweled canopies.

source_sentence: 當淨洗浴，以香塗身，著好淨衣，瓔珞自嚴，坐小卑座，不自高大，除去自在，離諸放逸，謙下自卑，除去憍慢，正念聽受如是妙典，於說法者生世尊想。
translation: They should bathe themselves in purity, rub themselves with incense, wear fine, pure clothing, adorn themselves in jewelry, sit on a small, lowly seat that doesn't exalt itself, rid themselves of dissipation, part with carelessness, humble themselves, rid themselves of conceit, and correctly listen with mindfulness to such a wonderful scripture, giving rise to the notion of the Bhagavān in the speaker of the Dharma.

source_sentence: 復於宮內后妃、王子、婇女、眷屬生慈哀心，和顏與語，勸以種種供養之具供養法師。
translation: Furthermore, he showed compassion to the palace's queen, princes, women, and retinue, spoke with a pleasant countenance, and encouraged them to make various offerings to the Dharma teacher.

source_sentence: 是王爾時既勸化已，即生無量歡喜快樂，心懷悅豫，倍復自勵，不生疲惓，多作利益，於說法者倍生恭敬。」
translation: After he encouraged and taught them, the king became immeasurably joyous and happy, rejoiced in his heart, repeatedly motivated himself, didn't become weary, and did much to benefit and venerate the Dharma preacher."

source_sentence: 爾時，佛告四天大王：「爾時，人王應著白淨鮮潔之衣，種種瓔珞齊整莊嚴，執持素帛微妙上蓋，服飾容儀不失常則，躬出奉迎說法之人。
translation: It was then that the Buddha addressed the four celestial kings, "At the time, the human king should wear white, pure, and pure robes, be adorned with various kinds of jewelry, carry a fine upper canopy of plain silk, and dress in a manner that doesn't lose its regularity as he goes out to greet the preacher.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 是王如是，隨其舉足步步之中即是供養值遇百千億那由他諸佛世尊，復得超越如是等劫生死之難，復於來世爾所劫中常得封受轉輪王位。
translation: Thus, the king thus makes offerings to and meets a hundred billion nayutas of the world-honored buddhas with each step he takes, transcends the difficulties of birth-and-death for many more eons, and is constantly ordained to the position of wheel-turning king in those next eons.

source_sentence: 隨其步步亦得如是現世功德：不可思議自在之力，常得最勝極妙七寶人天宮殿，在在生處增益壽命，言語辯了，人所信用，無所畏忌，有大名稱，常為人天之所恭敬，天上人中受上妙樂，得大勢力，具足威德，身色微妙，端嚴第一，常值諸佛，遇善知識，成就具足無量福聚。
translation: According to their steps, they'll also attain such merits in the present life: unfathomable powers of mastery, always attaining the most excellent and marvelous palaces of humans and gods, increasing longevity in their places of birth, eloquence in speech, credibility among people, fearlessness, a great reputation, constant respect from humans and gods, superior happiness up in heaven and among humans, great power, fully endowed with authority, a body that's exquisite in appearance and the most dignified, always meeting the buddhas, and meeting good friends who bring about an immeasurable stock of merit.

source_sentence: 「汝等四天王！
translation: "You four celestial kings!

source_sentence: 如是，人王見如是等種種無量功德利益，是故此王應當躬出奉迎法師，若一由旬至百千由旬。
translation: Thus, when the king of men sees these kinds of immeasurable merits and benefits, he should go out and greet the Dharma teacher for anywhere from a leap of faith to a hundred thousand leaps of faith.

source_sentence: 於說法師應生佛想，應作是念：『今日釋迦如來正智入於我宮受我供養、為我說法，我聞是法即不退轉於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，已為得值百千萬億那由他佛、為已供養過去未來現在諸佛、已得畢竟三惡道苦，我今已種百千無量轉輪聖王釋梵之因、已種無邊善根種子、已令無量百千萬億諸眾生等度於生死、已集無量無邊福聚，後宮眷屬已得擁護宮宅、諸衰悉以消滅，國土無有怨賊棘刺、他方怨敵不能侵凌。』
translation: 於說法師應生佛想，應作是念：『今日釋迦如來正智入於我宮受我供養、為我說法，我聞是法即不退轉於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，已為得值百千萬億那由他佛、為已供養過去未來現在諸佛、已得畢竟三惡道苦，我今已種百千無量轉輪聖王釋梵之因、已種無邊善根種子、已令無量百千萬億諸眾生等度於生死、已集無量無邊福聚，後宮眷屬已得擁護宮宅、諸衰悉以消滅，國土無有怨賊棘刺、他方怨敵不能侵凌。』

source_sentence: 「汝等四王！
translation: "You four kings!

source_sentence: 如是，人王應作如是供養正法，清淨聽受是妙經典，及恭敬、供養、尊重、讚嘆。
translation: Thus, the king of men should make such offerings to the right teaching, listen purely to and accept this wonderful sūtra, and venerate, make offerings to, respect, and praise it.

source_sentence: 持是經典四部之眾，亦當迴此所得最勝功德之分，施與汝等及餘眷屬、諸天、鬼神，聚集如是諸善功德，現世常得無量無邊、不可思議自在之利，威德、勢力、成就具足，能以正法摧伏諸惡。」
translation: The four groups of adherents of this sūtra should also bestow upon you and the rest of your retinues, gods, and spirits a share of the most excellent qualities they've attained, which will result in the accumulation of such good qualities that will always bring about immeasurable, limitless, and unfathomable benefits in the present life, and will be replete with authority, power, and accomplishment that will enable them to subdue evil with the right teaching."

source_sentence: 爾時，四王白佛言：「世尊！
translation: It was then that the four kings said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若未來世有諸人王作如是等恭敬正法，至心聽受是妙經典，及恭敬、供養、尊重、讚嘆，持是經典四部之眾嚴治舍宅、香汁灑地、專心正念聽說法時，我等四王亦當在中共聽此法，願諸人王為自利故，以己所得功德少分施與我等。
translation: If there will be human kings in the future who do this kind of reverence for the right teaching, wholeheartedly listen to and accept this wonderful sūtra, respect, make offerings, honor, and praise it, and hold the four sections of this sūtra in their homes, sprinkle incense and juice on the ground, and concentrate their minds on the teaching, then we four kings will be among them listening to this teaching together, and may those human kings give us a small portion of the merit they've gained for our own benefit.

source_sentence: 「世尊！
translation: "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 是諸人王於說法者所坐之處，為我等故燒種種香供養是經，是妙香氣於一念頃即至我等諸天宮殿，其香即時變成香蓋，其香微妙，金色晃耀照我等宮、釋宮、梵宮。
translation: At the place where the Dharma preacher was sitting, these human kings burned various kinds of incense for us to offer to this sūtra, and in an instant of thought, this wonderful fragrance reached our heavenly palaces, where it immediately became a fragrant lid with a subtle, golden shimmer that shone brightly in our palaces, the palaces of the Śākyas, and the palaces of Brahmā.

source_sentence: 大辯神天、功德神天、堅牢地神、散脂鬼神最大將軍二十八部鬼神大將，摩醯首羅、金剛密迹、摩尼跋陀鬼神大將、鬼子母與五百兒子周匝圍遶、阿耨達龍王、娑竭羅龍王，如是等眾自於宮殿，各各得聞是妙香氣及見香蓋光明普照，是香蓋光明亦照一切諸天宮殿。」
translation: The gods of eloquence, the gods of merit, the gods of the firmament, the largest general of the tallow demons, the generals of the twenty-eight demons, Mahêśvara, Vajrabhūmi, and Maṇibhadra, the mother of demons and her five hundred sons, the dragon king Anavatapta, and the dragon king Sāgara, each of these people in their palace could hear this wonderful fragrance and see the lid of the fragrance shining brightly, and the lid of the fragrance shone brightly in all the palaces of the gods."

source_sentence: 佛告四王：「是香蓋光明非但至汝四王宮殿。
translation: The Buddha told the four kings, "This fragrant luminosity doesn't just reach the palaces of the four of you.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 是諸人王手擎香鑪供養經時，其香遍布，於一念頃遍至三千大千世界百億日月、百億大海、百億須彌山、百億大鐵圍山、小鐵圍山及諸山王、百億四天下、百億四天王、百億三十三天，乃至百億非想非非想天。
translation: When these human kings held the incense tray in their hands to make offerings to the sūtras, the fragrance spread throughout the 3,000,000 world in an instant of thought, reaching 10 billion suns and moons, 10 billion oceans, 10 billion Sumeru mountains, 10 billion large and small iron mountains and mountain kings, 10 billion four heavens, 10 billion four heavenly kings, 10 billion Trāyastriṃśa gods, and even 10 billion non-perception and non-conception gods.

source_sentence: 於此三千大千世界百億三十三天、一切龍、鬼、乾闥婆、阿修羅、迦樓羅、緊那羅、摩睺羅伽宮殿，虛空悉滿種種香煙雲蓋，其蓋金光亦照宮殿。
translation: In these 10 billion Trāyastriṃśa gods of the 3,000,000 worlds and in the palaces of all the dragons, ghosts, gandharvas, asuras, kaluras, kiṃnaras, and mahoragas, the sky is filled with a variety of smoky cloud canopies, and their canopies shine with golden light in the palaces.

source_sentence: 如是，三千大千世界所有種種香煙雲蓋，皆是此經威神力故。
translation: Thus, all the various canopies of smoke and clouds of fragrance in the 3,000 great one-thousand worlds are the result of this sūtra's authoritative power.

source_sentence: 「是諸人王手擎香鑪供養經時，種種香氣不但遍此三千大千世界，於一念頃亦遍十方無量無邊恒河沙等百千萬億諸佛世界，於諸佛上虛空之中亦成香蓋，金色普照亦復如是。
translation: "When these human kings carry the incense tray in their hands to make offerings to the sūtra, the various fragrances not only permeate this 3,000,000 worlds, but also, in an instant of thought, permeate the infinite and limitless Ganges River Sands and hundreds of thousands of millions of buddha-worlds in the ten directions, creating fragrant canopies in the space above the buddhas that also shine with a golden halo.

source_sentence: 諸佛世尊聞是妙香、見是香蓋及金色光，於十方界恒河沙等諸佛世尊作如是等神力變化已，異口同音於說法者稱讚：『善哉，善哉！
translation: After the buddha world-honored ones heard this wonderful fragrance and saw this fragrant canopy and golden light, the buddha world-honored ones in the Ganges River Sands in the ten directions made such a miraculous transformation and spoke with one voice to the Dharma preacher, praising him, 'Good, good!

source_sentence: 大士！
translation: Mañjuśrī!

source_sentence: 汝能廣宣流布如是甚深微妙經典，則為成就無量無邊、不可思議功德之聚。』
translation: If you can widely proclaim and disseminate such a profound and subtle sūtra, you'll achieve a measureless and limitless stock of unfathomable merit.'

source_sentence: 若有聞是甚深經典，所得功德則為不少，況持讀誦、為他眾生開示、分別演說其義？
translation: If someone hears such a profound sūtra, they'll attain quite a bit of merit, so how could they maintain, recite, expound, and discern the meaning of it for other sentient beings?

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 此金光明微妙經典，無量無邊億那由他諸菩薩等若得聞者，即不退轉於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: If this subtle scripture of golden light were to be heard by measureless and limitless billions of nayutas and other bodhisattvas, they would not retrogress from the unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 爾時，十方無量無邊恒河沙等諸佛世界現在諸佛，異口同聲作如是言：『善男子！
translation: At that point, the present buddhas of the infinite and unlimited number of Gaṅgāsā buddha-worlds in the ten directions spoke with one voice and said, 'Good sons!

source_sentence: 汝於來世畢定當得坐於道場菩提樹下，於三界中最尊最勝，出過一切眾生之上，勤修力故受諸苦行，善能莊嚴菩提道場，能壞三千大千世界外道邪論，摧伏諸魔、怨賊、異形，覺了諸法第一寂滅，清淨無垢甚深無上菩提之道。
translation: In a future life, you will surely sit under the bodhi tree on the site of enlightenment, most honored and most distinguished among the three realms, above all sentient beings, diligently cultivating the strength to undergo austerities, well able to adorn the site of enlightenment, capable of destroying the mistaken theories of the three thousand great worlds of non-Buddhists, subduing demons, enemies, and aliens, and awakening to the first cessation of all dharmas, pure and undefiled, and the profound unsurpassed path to enlightenment.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 汝已能坐金剛座處、轉於無上諸佛所讚十二種行甚深法輪、能擊無上最大法鼓、能吹無上極妙法蠡、能竪無上最勝法幢、能然無上極明法炬、能雨無上甘露法雨、能斷無量煩惱怨結、能令無量百千萬億那由他眾度於無涯可畏大海、能脫生死無際輪轉、復遇無量百千萬億那由他佛。』」
translation: You have been able to sit at the adamantine seat, turn the Dharma wheel of unsurpassed twelve practices praised by the buddhas as being quite profound, beat the unsurpassed greatest Dharma drum, blow the unsurpassed most marvelous Dharma calabash, make the unsurpassed most excellent Dharma banner, produce the unsurpassed most brilliant Dharma torch, rain the unsurpassed sweet dew Dharma rain, cut the bonds of affliction and enmity, cause measureless hundreds of thousands of thousands of millions of nayutas to cross the endless and fearless ocean, escape the endless cycle of birth and death, and meet measureless hundreds of thousands of thousands of thousands of thousands of nayutas.'"

source_sentence: 爾時，四天王復白佛言：「世尊！
translation: It was then that the four heavenly kings again said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 是金光明微妙經典能得未來現在種種無量功德。
translation: This subtle scripture of golden light can obtain measureless merits in the future and present.

source_sentence: 是故，人王若得聞是微妙經典，則為已於百千萬億無量佛所種諸善根。
translation: Therefore, if a human king hears this subtle sūtra, then he will have planted good roots in one hundred thousand million million numberless buddha-places.

source_sentence: 我以敬念是人王故、復見無量福德利故，我等四王及餘眷屬、無量百千萬億鬼神，於自宮殿見是種種香煙雲蓋瑞應之時，我當隱蔽不現其身，為聽法故，當至是王所止宮殿講法之處；大梵天王、釋提桓因、大辯天神、功德天神、堅牢地神、散脂鬼神大將軍等二十八部鬼神大將，摩醯首羅、金剛密迹、摩尼跋陀鬼神大將、鬼子母及五百鬼子周匝圍遶、阿耨達龍王、娑竭羅龍王，無量百千萬億那由他鬼神、諸天，如是等眾為聽法故，悉自隱蔽不現其身，至是人王所止宮殿講法之處。
translation: 我以敬念是人王故、復見無量福德利故，我等四王及餘眷屬、無量百千萬億鬼神，於自宮殿見是種種香煙雲蓋瑞應之時，我當隱蔽不現其身，為聽法故，當至是王所止宮殿講法之處；大梵天王、釋提桓因、大辯天神、功德天神、堅牢地神、散脂鬼神大將軍等二十八部鬼神大將，摩醯首羅、金剛密迹、摩尼跋陀鬼神大將、鬼子母及五百鬼子周匝圍遶、阿耨達龍王、娑竭羅龍王，無量百千萬億那由他鬼神、諸天，如是等眾為聽法故，悉自隱蔽不現其身，至是人王所止宮殿講法之處。

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我等四王及餘眷屬、無量鬼神，悉當同心以是人王為善知識，同共一行——善相應行——能為無上大法施主，以甘露味充足我等。
translation: We four kings, the rest of our retinues, and measureless demons and spirits should all join together and consider this human king to be a good teacher who shares a common practice-a practice that's well suited to it-and who can be a great donor of unsurpassed qualities and fill us with the taste of ambrosia.

source_sentence: 我等應當擁護是王，除其衰患，令得安隱，及其宮宅、國土、城邑諸惡災患悉令消滅。
translation: We should support this king, remove his troubles and make him comfortable, and extinguish all the bad and dangerous things that afflict his palace, land, and city.

source_sentence: 「世尊！
translation: "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若有人王於此經典心生捨離、不樂聽聞，其心不欲恭敬、供養、尊重、讚嘆；若四部眾有受持、讀誦、讚說之者，亦復不能恭敬、供養、尊重、讚嘆；我等四王及餘眷屬、無量鬼神，即便不得聞此正法，背甘露味、失大法利，無有勢力及以威德，減損天眾、增長惡趣。
translation: If there are any kings whose minds are discarding this sūtra, who don't enjoy listening to it, whose minds don't want to respect, offer support, honor, and praise it, and if there are four groups of people who accept, recite, and praise it, they also won't be able to respect, offer support, honor, and praise it; even if we four kings, the rest of our retinues, and measureless demons and spirits can't hear this right teaching, we'll be denied the taste of ambrosia and lose the great benefits of the Dharma, and we'll lack power and authority, which will diminish the host of gods and increase the bad destinies.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我等四王及無量鬼神捨其國土；不但我等，亦有無量守護國土諸舊善神皆悉捨去。
translation: "We four kings and measureless demons abandoned our land, and not only we, but also measureless old good spirits who guarded it, abandoned them all.

source_sentence: 我等諸天及諸鬼神既捨離已，其國當有種種災異，一切人民失其善心，唯有繫縛、瞋恚、鬪諍、互相破壞、多諸疾疫、彗星現怪、流星崩落、五星諸宿違失常度、兩日並現、日月薄蝕、白黑惡虹數數出現、大地震動發大音聲、惡風惡雨無日不有、穀米勇貴、飢饉凍餓、多有他方怨賊侵掠，其國人民多受苦惱、其地無有可愛樂處。
translation: After we gods and demons abandon them, there will be various calamities in that country, and all the people will lose their good intentions and become bound, angry, and combative, destroying each other, plagued by epidemics, strange comets appearing, meteors falling, the five constellations out of alignment, two suns appearing together, the sun and moon eroding, white and black bad rainbows appearing repeatedly, a great earthquake making a loud noise, bad winds and rain occurring every day, grain and rice becoming expensive, hunger and starvation, many enemies and thieves from other places, and the people of that country suffering and distress, and there's no place to be loved or enjoyed in that land.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我等四王及諸無量百千鬼神并守國土諸舊善神遠離去時，生如是等無量惡事。
translation: When the four of us kings and measureless hundreds of thousands of demons and old good spirits guarding the land left, this and other measureless bad things happened.

source_sentence: 「世尊！
translation: "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若有人王欲得自護及王國土多受安樂、欲令國土一切眾生悉皆成就具足快樂、欲得摧伏一切外敵、欲得擁護一切國土、欲以正法正治國土、欲得除滅眾生怖畏，世尊！
translation: "If there's a king who wants to be able to protect himself and enjoy much comfort in his kingdom, who wants to make all the sentient beings in his kingdom perfectly happy, who wants to subdue all external enemies, who wants to uphold all his kingdoms, who wants to correctly govern his kingdom with the right teaching, and who wants to remove the fears of sentient beings, Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 是人王等應當畢定聽是經典，及恭敬供養讀誦受持是經典者。
translation: "These kings should always listen intently to this sūtra and respectfully make offerings to those who read, recite, and uphold it.

source_sentence: 我等四王及無量鬼神以是法食善根因緣，得服甘露無上法味，增長身力、心進勇銳、增益諸天。
translation: Because of the good roots and causes of this Dharma food, the four of us kings and measureless demons will be able to take the unsurpassed Dharma taste of ambrosia, which will increase our physical strength, mental prowess, and fortitude, and enhance the gods.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 以是人王至心聽受是經典故。
translation: That's why the human king wholeheartedly listened to this sūtra's explanation.

source_sentence: 「如諸梵天說出欲論、釋提桓因種種善論、五通之人神仙之論，世尊！
translation: "As the brahma gods have taught the Treatise on Renunciation of Desire, the Treatise on the Various Virtues of Śakra Devānām-Indra, and the Treatise on the Five Supernormal Powers of Men and Gods, Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 梵天、釋提桓因、五神通人雖有百千億那由他無量勝論，是金光明於中最勝。
translation: Although Brahmā, Śakra Devānām-Indra, and the five supernormal powers are ten trillion nayutas in number, this is the greatest of them all, that is, golden light.

source_sentence: 所以者何？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 如來說是金光明經為眾生故，為令一切閻浮提內諸人王等以正法治、為與一切眾生安樂、為欲愛護一切眾生、欲令眾生無諸苦惱、無有他方怨賊棘刺、所有諸惡背而不向、欲令國土無有憂惱、以正法教無有諍訟。
translation: The Tathāgata explains that this golden light sūtra is for the sake of sentient beings, for the sake of all the human kings in Jambudvīpa who rule correctly, for the sake of the well-being of all sentient beings, for the sake of loving and protecting all sentient beings, for the sake of making sentient beings free of suffering and distress, free of the thorns of enemies and thieves from other directions, free of the turning away of all evil, for the sake of making their lands free of sorrow, and for the sake of teaching the right Dharma without strife.

source_sentence: 是故，人王各於國土應然法炬熾然正法，增益天眾。
translation: Because of this, each of the human kings' lands should be lit by the torch of the Dharma, blazing with the right Dharma and augmenting the host of gods.

source_sentence: 我等四王及無量鬼神、閻浮提內諸天善神，以是因緣得服甘露、法味充足、得大威德、進力具足；閻浮提內安隱豐樂，人民熾盛，安樂其處，復於來世無量百千不可思議那由他劫常受微妙第一快樂，復得值遇無量諸佛種諸善根，然後證成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: As a result, we four kings, measureless demons, and the gods and goddesses of Jambudvīpa will be able to drink nectar, replete with the taste of the Dharma, attain great authority, and possess complete power, and within Jambudvīpa peace and plenty of happiness, the people will flourish and be comfortable in their places, and in measureless hundreds of thousands of unfathomable nayutas in the future they'll always experience the most subtle happiness and meet measureless buddhas who will plant good roots and then realize supreme perfect enlightenment.

source_sentence: 如是等無量功德，悉是如來正遍知說。
translation: Such incalculable merits are all explained by the Tathāgata's correct omniscience.

source_sentence: 如來過於百千億那由他諸梵天等，以大悲力故；亦過無量百千億那由他釋提桓因，以苦行力故。
translation: 如來過於百千億那由他諸梵天等，以大悲力故；亦過無量百千億那由他釋提桓因，以苦行力故。

source_sentence: 是故，如來為諸眾生演說如是金光明經。
translation: Therefore, the Tathāgata teaches this golden light sūtra for all sentient beings.

source_sentence: 若閻浮提一切眾生及諸人王，世間、出世間所作國事、所造世論，皆因此經——欲令眾生得安樂故——釋迦如來示現是經廣宣流布。
translation: If all the sentient beings in Jambudvīpa and all the human kings, worldly and supramundane affairs of state and worldly discussions that they create are based on this sūtra - in order to bring comfort to sentient beings - the Tathāgata demonstrates and disseminates this sūtra.

source_sentence: 「世尊！
translation: "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 以是因緣故，是諸人王應當畢定聽受，供養、恭敬、尊重、讚嘆是經。」
translation: Because of these reasons, these human kings should definitely listen to, make offerings to, revere, respect, and praise this sūtra."

source_sentence: 爾時，佛復告四天王：「汝等四王及餘眷屬、無量百千那由他鬼神！
translation: It was then that the Buddha again addressed the four heavenly kings, "You four kings, the rest of your retinues, and measureless hundreds of thousands of nayuta spirits!

source_sentence: 是諸人王若能至心聽是經典，供養、恭敬、尊重、讚嘆，汝等四王正應擁護，滅其衰患而與安樂。
translation: "If these human kings wholeheartedly listen to this sūtra and offer support, respect, honor, and praise it, you four kings should properly support it, ending their troubles and bringing peace and happiness.

source_sentence: 若有人能廣宣流布如是妙典——於人天中大作佛事，能大利益無量眾生——如是之人汝等四王必當擁護，莫令他緣而得擾亂，令心澹靜受於快樂，續復當得廣宣是經。」
translation: If someone can widely proclaim and disseminate such a wonderful sūtra - one that does great Buddha-works among humans and gods and greatly benefits measureless sentient beings - such a person you four kings will surely support and not allow other causes to disturb them, so that the mind is calm and experiences happiness, and then you'll be able to widely proclaim this sūtra."

source_sentence: 爾時，四王即從坐起，偏袒右肩，右膝著地，長跪合掌於世尊前以偈讚曰：「佛月清淨，　　滿足莊嚴；　　佛日暉曜，　放千光明。
translation: At that point, the four kings rose from their seats, bared their right shoulders, knelt on their right knees, knelt down long enough to join their palms before the Bhagavān, and praised him in verse, saying, "The Buddha's moon is pure and perfectly adorned, and the Buddha's sun shines and radiates a thousand rays of light.

source_sentence: 如來面目，　　最上明淨。
translation: The Tathāgata's face is supremely clear and pure.

source_sentence: 齒白無垢，　　如蓮華根；　　功德無量，　猶如大海；　　智淵無邊，　　法水具足，　百千三昧，　　無有缺減；　　足下平滿，　千輻相現，　　足指網縵，　　猶如鵝王；　光明晃曜，　　如寶山王；　　微妙清淨，　如鍊真金。
translation: His teeth are white and spotless like the lotus root, his virtues are immeasurable like the ocean, his wisdom abounds, his Dharma waters are plentiful, his one hundred thousand samādhis are without loss, his feet are flat and full, his thousand-spoked body appears, and his toes are webbed like a goose king, his brightness shines like a jeweled mountain king, and he's as exquisitely pure as smelting real gold.

source_sentence: 所有福德，　　不可思議，　佛功德山，　　我今敬禮。
translation: Of unfathomable merit, this mountain of Buddha's virtue is now my homage.

source_sentence: 佛真法身，　猶如虛空，　　應物現形，　　如水中月，　無有障礙，　　如焰、如化。
translation: The true Dharma body of the Buddha is like space, manifesting itself in response to things like the moon in water, unobstructed, like a flame, and like a transformation.

source_sentence: 是故我今，　稽首佛月。」
translation: Now, therefore, I bow my head to the Buddha's moon."

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊以偈答曰：「此金光明，　　諸經之王，　　甚深最勝，　為無有上。
translation: At that point, the Bhagavān answered with a verse, "This golden radiance, the king of sūtras, is so profound and most excellent that it has no equal.

source_sentence: 十力世尊，　　之所宣說，　汝等四王，　　應當勤護。
translation: It's taught by the Bhagavān of the Ten Powers, and you four kings should guard it diligently.

source_sentence: 以是因緣，　是深妙典，　　能與眾生，　　無量快樂。
translation: Because of these causes and conditions, this is a profound and wonderful scripture that can give measureless happiness to sentient beings.

source_sentence: 為諸眾生，　　安樂利益，　　故久流布，　於閻浮提。
translation: For the sake of the well-being and benefit of sentient beings, it's long been disseminated in Jambudvīpa.

source_sentence: 能滅三千，　　大千世界，　所有惡趣，　　無量諸苦。
translation: It can extinguish 3,000 great thousand worlds, all the bad destinies, and measureless suffering.

source_sentence: 閻浮提內，　諸人王等，　　心生慈愍，　　正法治世。
translation: Within Jambudvīpa, the human kings and others become compassionate, and they correctly govern the world.

source_sentence: 若能流布，　　此妙經典，　　則令其土，　安隱豐熟，　　所有眾生，　　悉受快樂。
translation: If they could disseminate this wonderful sūtra, their lands would be peaceful and abundant, and all sentient beings would experience happiness.

source_sentence: 若有人王，　　欲愛己身、　　及其國土，　欲令豐盛，　　應當至心，　　淨潔洗浴，　往法會所，　　聽受是典。
translation: If there are kings who want to love themselves and their lands and want them to be abundant, they should wholeheartedly cleanse and bathe themselves, go to the Dharma assembly, and listen to this sūtra.

source_sentence: 是經能作，　所有善事，　　摧伏一切，　　內外怨賊，　復能除滅，　　無量怖畏。
translation: These sūtras are capable of performing all kinds of good deeds, subduing all internal and external enemies and thieves, and extinguishing measureless fears.

source_sentence: 是諸經王，　能與一切，　　無量眾生，　　安隱快樂。
translation: This is the king of sūtras, who can give peace and happiness to all sentient beings without measure.

source_sentence: 譬如寶樹，　　在人家中，　　悉能出生，　一切珍寶；　　是妙經典，　　亦復如是，　悉能出生，　　諸王功德。
translation: Like a jeweled tree that produces all the treasures in a person's home, so too do these wonderful sūtras produce the king's merits.

source_sentence: 如清冷水，　能除渴乏；　　是妙經典，　　亦復如是，　能除諸王，　　功德渴乏。
translation: Like clear, cold water that quells thirst, so too does this wonderful sūtra quell the thirst of kings for their virtues.

source_sentence: 譬如珍寶、　異物篋器，　　悉在于手，　　隨意所用；　是金光明，　　亦復如是，　　隨意能與，　諸王法寶。
translation: Like a treasure or a container for another thing that's in your hand and can be used as you like, so too is this gold light that can be given to kings as you like, a treasure of the Dharma.

source_sentence: 是金光明，　　微妙經典，　常為諸天，　　恭敬供養；　　亦為護世、　四大天王，　　威神勢力，　　之所護持；　十方諸佛，　　常念是經，　　若有演說，　稱讚善哉；　　亦有百千，　　無量鬼神，　從十方來，　　擁護是人。
translation: This golden light, a marvelous sūtra, is always offered with respect and veneration by the gods; it's also protected by the world and the four great heavenly kings, whose might and power guard it; the buddhas in the ten directions are always mindful of this sūtra, and if they expound it, they praise it as good; hundreds of thousands of measureless ghosts and spirits come from the ten directions to protect this person.

source_sentence: 若有得聞，　是妙經典，　　心生歡喜，　　踊躍無量。
translation: If someone hears this wonderful sūtra, their heart rejoices and rises incalculably.

source_sentence: 閻浮提內，　　無量大眾，　　皆悉歡喜，　集聽是法。
translation: Measureless multitudes in Jambudvīpa rejoice as they assemble to hear this teaching.

source_sentence: 聽是經故，　　具諸威德，　增益天眾，　　精氣身力。」
translation: As a result of listening to this sūtra, they'll attain authoritative qualities that will enhance the energy and physical strength of the gods."

source_sentence: 爾時，四王聞是偈已白佛言：「世尊！
translation: After hearing this verse, the four kings said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我從昔來未曾得聞如是微妙寂滅之法。
translation: Never since the distant past have I been able to hear such a subtle and tranquil teaching.

source_sentence: 我聞是已，心生悲喜、涕淚橫流、舉身戰動、支體嬉怡，復得無量不可思議具足妙樂。」
translation: After hearing this, my heart was overcome with compassion and joy, tears flowed down my face, my body shook with joy, and my limbs were filled with unfathomable, complete, and marvelous joy."

source_sentence: 以天曼陀羅華、摩訶曼陀羅華供養奉散於如來上，作如是等供養佛已，復白佛言：「世尊！
translation: After making these offerings to the Tathāgata with celestial maṇḍala flowers and mahāmandala flowers, he then said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我等四王各各自有五百鬼神，常當隨逐是說法者而為守護。」
translation: Each of the four of us kings has five hundred demons who will always follow this Dharma speaker and guard him."

source_sentence: 合部金光明經卷第五
translation: Combined Section Golden Light Sutra, Volume 5
